title: darwin 386 test/64bit: int64 const 4294967295 & var -2147483648 = 2147483648 should be 2147483649
body:
by **Dan.Glastonbury**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. cd $GOROOT/src
2. ./all.bash

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

--- cd ../test
4,8d3
< =========== ./64bit.go
< int64 const 4294967295 / var -2147483648 = -1 should be -2147483648
< int64 const 4294967295 & var -2147483648 = 2147483648 should be 2147483649
< BUG: 64bit

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

GOOS=darwin
GOARCH=386 

Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)

changeset:   3975:b51fd2d6c160
tag:         tip
user:        Kevin Ballard <kevin@sb.org>
date:        Tue Nov 10 20:05:24 2009 -0800
summary:     Implement new emacs command M-x gofmt

Please provide any additional information below.
